CamTCC595.First Lines:
Cros and Curteis Crist þis bygynnynge spedeffor þe
                    faderes frendchipe þat fourmede heueneAnd þoruȝ þe
                    speciall spirit þat sprong of hem tweyneAnd alle in on godhed endles
                    dwelleþ…
CamTCC595.Last Lines:
…& ȝyue hem wiit & good will swiche dedes to
                    wercheÞat þei maie wynnen þe lif þat euer schal
                    lesten

BLRoy18Bxvii.First Lines:
Crose and curtys crist thys begynyng spedeffor the ffathers
                    ffrendshipe that fformyd hevin…
BLRoy18Bxvii.Last Lines:
…and gyve them wyt and good will such dedes to werchethat they
                    may wynnen the lyff that euer shall lasten
